agropulse.title: AgroPulse - MVP Solution for Agronomy
agropulse.description: MVP solution for agronomy that evaluates plantations and resources, analyzes crop conditions and provides recommendations for crop care, helping farmers make informed decisions

skoHubLibrary.title: SKO Hub Digital Library
skoHubLibrary.description: Developed for SKO Hub. Modern platform for online library with book catalog, search and multilingual support. Works on digital tablets and actively used in regions

incampus.title: inCampus - Startup App for Universities
incampus.description: Modern student platform with AI assistant. Combines schedule, grades, deadlines, communication with teachers and all university events. Intelligent assistant analyzes workload, helps plan studies and reminds about important assignments

kuadmin.title: KuAdmin - Admin Panel for Kozybayev University
kuadmin.description: Developed for Kozybayev University. Website for managing inCampus app data. Administrative dashboard for managing students, applications, dormitory, voting and all university data

about.title: Next-generation cyber digital agency
about.intro: We craft digital products and AI systems that help businesses grow, optimise processes, and increase revenue. We design AI assistants, websites, and mobile applications from scratch, tailored to your business logic. We create an environment where business is automated, protected, scalable, and ready for the digital era.
